html:
Mindy Kaling's Amazon Handmade Holiday Collection is finally here! The line includes great gifts, like a cheese board, vase and candles—all made by artisans.

— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

Whether you know her as Kelly Kapoor from "The Office" or Dr. Mindy Lahiri from "The Mindy Project," if you're a Mindy Kaling fan, you're in luck. The famously hilarious actress just released a new collection on Amazon Handmade—just in time for prime holiday shopping season.

The curated collection includes a wide variety of must-have gifts, all made by six artisans from around the world. Some of the pieces are even co-designed by Mindy herself. "I'm super passionate about supporting small businesses, so I'm very excited for you to shop our unique items and help these brands grow," she said. 

Want to shop the Mindy Kaling Amazon Handmade Holiday Collection for yourself? Here's everything you need to know, including our top picks.

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting team at Reviewed.

What to buy from Mindy Kaling's Amazon Handmade Holiday Collection

Mindy's new Amazon Handmade Holiday Collection consist of 23 giftable handcrafted products ranging in price from $16 to $80. For her, you can snag an elegant leather jewelry holder or a minimalist ring holder. For him, consider a monogrammed leather toiletry bag. And for your friends, parents or coworkers—or anyone else, really—on your list, a classy ceramic cake stand, deliciously scented candles or gorgeous maple and mahogany cheese board make for wonderful presents this season.

  • Get the Honeycomb Studio Minimalist Ceramic Ring Holder from Amazon for $16
  • Get the Sweetwater Decor Candle from Amazon for $20
  • Get the Specialty Wood Designs Small Multi Wood Cutting Board from Amazon for $27.95
  • Get the Northwind Leather Jewelry Tray from Amazon for $38.50
  • Get the Northwind Leather Personalized Dopp Kit from Amazon for $42.50
  • Get the Specialty Wood Designs Large Ambrosia Maple Wood Cutting Board from Amazon for $48.99
  • Get the Honeycomb Studio White and Gold Ceramic Cake Stand from Amazon for $80

Note that given Mindy's celebrity status, these pieces may sell out so you'll want to scoop them up quickly if you see something you like.

Shop the Mindy Kaling Amazon Handmade Holiday Collection

Don't get thwarted by shipping delays or sold-out favorites this holiday season.  Sign up for our free weekly newsletter and get the product reviews, deals and holiday gift guides you need to start shopping now.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.

This article originally appeared on Reviewed: Mindy Kaling just released a holiday collection on Amazon—here's what to buy
